## Find source and headers
FILE(GLOB_RECURSE HEADERS *.h)
FILE(GLOB_RECURSE SOURCES *.c*)

IF(CMAKE_HAS_SORT)
  LIST(SORT HEADERS)
  LIST(SORT SOURCES)
ENDIF(CMAKE_HAS_SORT)

## Build
INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
  ${OGG_INCLUDE_DIR}
  ${VORBIS_INCLUDE_DIR}
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib
)

ADD_LIBRARY(vorbis STATIC ${SOURCES} ${HEADERS})
